trans-unit.source: Provides a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents the sizing template of the left border of a small window.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" />，表示小視窗的左框線之縮放樣板。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> that represents the sizing template of the left border of a small window, such as a tool window.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate.Normal%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate>類別會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>表示縮放樣板的小視窗，例如工具視窗的左框線。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate.Normal%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a visual style element that represents the sizing template of the left border of a small window.
trans-unit.target: 取得視覺化樣式項目，表示小視窗的左框線之縮放樣板。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" /> that represents the sizing template of the left border of a small window.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement" />，表示小視窗的左框線之縮放樣板。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate.Normal%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate.Normal%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.SmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate.Normal%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate1` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowSmallFrameLeftSizingTemplate1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
